mapper.insert: insert into ALBUMLIST ( ALBUM_NUM, ALBUM_WRITER, ALBUM_NAME, ALBUM_PARTY, ALBUM_DELETE, ALBUM_CONTENTS, ALBUM_VERSION, ALBUM_CATEGORY ) values ( ALBUMLIST_SEQ.nextval, #{album_writer}, #{album_name}, #{album_party}, #{album_delete}, #{album_contents}, #{album_version}, #{album_category} )
